resources.string: Where do you want to go?
How much free time do you have?

The Qafqaz Tufandag Hotel welcomes you with its charming nature, Eastern hospitality and lovely atmosphere. The hotel is located at the foot of the Caucasus mountains, on the bank of the River Demiraparanchay. You will enjoy the lap of nature with dazzling beauty of emerald green forests and spectacular snowcapped mountains. The distance between the city centre of Baku and the hotel is 225 km and 20 km from the Qabala international airport.
